name: Lost Flame
description:
Lost Flame is a modern roguelike game featuring unique and challenging turn-based combat. Explore the ruined kingdom of Hiraeth, discover its history or ignore it and focus on the gameplay itself.Key Features
  • turn-based
  • permadeath
  • cinematic music and rich sound effects
  • unique pixel art
  • procedural content
  • tons of different possible builds
  • different weapons require different strategy in combat
  • active development and regular updates
